panels.description: The memory usage of the process (in kilobytes on Unix-based systems, bytes on MacOS)
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: CPU time in % of a single core (not % of all cores)
panels.title: CPU Average Utilization (Single Core)

panels.description: The current time, represented as the number of seconds since the epoch
panels.title: Time Since Epoch

panels.description: The number of seconds since the homeserver was last started
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: The number of registered users on the homeserver
panels.title: Total Users

panels.description: The number of users, excluding those created by an Application Service
panels.title: Total Non-bridged Users

panels.description: The total number of rooms present on the homeserver
panels.title: Total Rooms

panels.description: The configured global factor value for caching
panels.title: Cache Factor

panels.description: The configured event_cache_size value for caching
panels.title: Event Cache Size

panels.description: The number of native users created in the last 24 hours
panels.title: Daily Registered Users

panels.description: The number of guest users created in the last 24 hours
panels.title: Daily Registered Guest Users

panels.description: The number of users created by Application Services in the last 24 hours
panels.title: Daily Registered Bridged Users

panels.description: The number of unique users that have used the homeserver in the last 24 hours
panels.title: Daily Active Users

panels.description: The number of rooms that have had a (state) event with the type m.room.message sent in them in the last 24 hours
panels.title: Daily Active Rooms

panels.description: The number of rooms that have had a (state) event with the type m.room.encrypted sent in them in the last 24 hours
panels.title: Daily Active E2EE Rooms

panels.description: The number of (state) events with the type m.room.message seen in the last 24 hours
panels.title: Daily Messages

panels.description: The number of (state) events sent by a local user with the type m.room.encrypted seen in the last 24 hours
panels.title: Daily E2EE Messages

panels.description: The number of (state) events sent by a local user with the type m.room.message seen in the last 24 hours
panels.title: Daily Sent Messages

panels.description: The number of (state) events sent by a local user with the type m.room.encrypted seen in the last 24 hours
panels.title: Daily Sent E2EE Messages

panels.description: The number of unique users that have used the homeserver in the last 30 days
panels.title: Monthly Active Users

panels.description: The number of 30 day retained users, with a revised algorithm. Defined as users that appear more than once in the past 60 days, and have more than 30 days between the most and least recent appearances in the past 60 days. Includes clients that do not fit into the below r30 client types
panels.title: Monthly Retained Users

panels.description: The number of 30 day retained users, as defined above. Filtered only to clients with ("riot" or "element") and "android" (case-insensitive) in the user agent string
panels.title: Monthly Retained Android Users

panels.description: The number of 30 day retained users, as defined above. Filtered only to clients with ("riot" or "element") and "ios" (case-insensitive) in the user agent string
panels.title: Monthly Retained iOS Users

panels.description: The number of 30 day retained users, as defined above. Filtered only to clients with ("riot" or "element") and "electron" (case-insensitive) in the user agent string
panels.title: Monthly Retained Electron Users

panels.description: The number of 30 day retained users, as defined above. Filtered only to clients with "mozilla" or "gecko" (case-insensitive) in the user agent string
panels.title: Monthly Retained Web Users
